summary: SlidesPage.tsx was updated to render an pointing at /assets/Morris, 2012, QR code.png with responsive classes and an English alt text, but the actual PNG asset file was not added under a public static assets directory in the diff. Two unrelated metadata/state files were also modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image file "Morris, 2012, QR code.png" to the frontend static assets under the existing public assets path convention (e.g., frontend/public/assets/...) so it is served by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and there is no evidence the PNG was committed under frontend/public/assets (or any public static assets directory). SlidesPage references the file path, but the asset itself is not present in the change summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/state metadata (project_state.json) unrelated to rendering the Slides image.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add a static asset and render it on /slides; it does not request updates to project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt content unrelated to the Slides image requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request generating/updating repository file summary documentation.
